panels.description: Total customer licensed capacity.

targets.query: SELECT mean("nasuni_account_license_capacity") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("nasuni_account_used_percentage") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Nasuni Licensed Capacity Total vs Used

panels.description: Nasuni appliance platform type.

targets.query: SELECT last("filer_platform_name") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Platform

panels.description: Nasuni software release version.
panels.title: Version

panels.description: The 1/5/15 minute load averages.

targets.query: SELECT max("cpula1") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("cpula5") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: CPU Load Average

panels.description: The 1/5/15 minute average load of disk (%).

targets.query: SELECT max("diskiola1") FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$CacheDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "diskiodevice"
SELECT max("diskiola5") FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$CacheDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "diskiodevice"
SELECT max("diskiola15") FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$CacheDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "diskiodevice"

panels.title: Cache Disk Load

panels.description: Displays cache usage over time. Helpful for planning future cache size requirements.

targets.query: SELECT mean("filer_cache_total") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("filer_cache_used") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cache Growth

panels.description:
The amount of time since this host was last
initialized. (hrSystemUptime)

targets.query: SELECT mean("filer_online") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Number of connected SMB clients.

targets.query: SELECT last("filer_total_share_clients") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: SMB Connections

panels.description: % CPU utilization (1m).

targets.query: SELECT last("cpu_idle")  * -1 +100 FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)

panels.title: CPU

panels.description: The total number of active shares.

targets.query: SELECT last("filer_total_shares") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Total Shares

panels.description:
The total amount of real/physical memory installed
on this host and the amount of real/physical memory currently unused or available.

targets.query: SELECT last("mem_total_real") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_avail_real") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: RAM

panels.description: The 1/5/15 minute max load of disk (%).

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("diskioreads"), 10s) FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$CacheDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("diskiowrites"), 10s) FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$CacheDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cache Disk I/O

panels.description:
Clients to Nasuni transmit/receive bits/second for the last 1 minute.
Nasuni to Cloud transmit/receive bits/second for the last 1 minute.

targets.query: SELECT max("filer_nw_clients_in") AS "Clients In", max("filer_nw_clients_out") AS "Clients Out", max("filer_nw_cloud_in") AS "Cloud In", max("filer_nw_cloud_out") AS "Cloud Out" FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Network Throughput

panels.description: Memory utilization.

targets.query: SELECT (last("mem_total_real") - (last("mem_avail_real") + last("mem_cached"))) / last("mem_total_real") * 100 FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Active number of open file locks.

targets.query: SELECT last("filer_total_share_locks") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: File Locks

panels.description: Cache utilization.

targets.query: SELECT (mean("filer_cache_used") / mean("filer_cache_total")) * 100 FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

panels.title: Cache

panels.description: Data that is yet to be snapped to your object storage provider.
panels.title: Unprotected Data

panels.description: Tracks Linux memory usage. Both Cached and Buffered memory normally show as used, but are available for the OS and Applications to use.

targets.query: SELECT (last("mem_total_real") - last("mem_avail_real")) / last("mem_total_real") * 100 FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT (last("mem_cached"))/ last("mem_total_real") * 100   FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT (last("mem_buffer"))/ last("mem_total_real") * 100   FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: The number of read & write accesses on this device since boot.

targets.query: SELECT max("diskiola1") FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$RootDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("diskiola5") FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$RootDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("diskiola15") FROM "nasuni_disk" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/ AND "diskiodevice" =~ /^$RootDisk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: OS Disk Load

panels.description: SMB connection count over time.

targets.query: SELECT last("filer_total_share_clients") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: SMB Connections

panels.description: This graph allows you to monitor cache activity in a little more detail.  eg What your % cache miss ratio looks like.

targets.query: SELECT last("filer_read_hits") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("filer_read_misses") FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("filer_read_misses") / (last("filer_read_hits") + last("filer_read_misses")) * 100 FROM "Nasuni" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Appliance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Cache Activity

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Nasuni" WITH KEY = "customer"
list.label: Customer
list.name: Customer
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Nasuni" WITH KEY = "customer"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Nasuni" WITH KEY = "filer_location" WHERE customer =~ /$Customer/
list.label: Region
list.name: Region
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Nasuni" WITH KEY = "filer_location" WHERE customer =~ /$Customer/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Nasuni" WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE customer =~ /$Customer/ AND filer_location =~ /$Region/
list.label: Appliance
list.name: Appliance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Nasuni" WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE customer =~ /$Customer/ AND filer_location =~ /$Region/
